ca.cgjennings.ui.textedit.completion

Class CodeAlternative

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.cgjennings.ui.textedit.completion.CodeAlternative
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<CodeAlternative>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultCodeAlternative

    public abstract class CodeAlternative
extends Object
implements Comparable<CodeAlternative>
    A code alternative represents one possible option for completing a code fragment. Code alternatives are generated on demand by a CodeCompleter.
    Since:
    3.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CodeAlternative() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void apply()
      Applies this code alternative in the editor for which it was created.
      int compareTo(CodeAlternative other)
      Sorts code alternatives by scope, then context (if any), then string representation.
      abstract String getCategory()
      Returns an optional description of the context for the alternative.
      abstract Icon getIcon()
      Optionally returns an icon to display for the alternative.
      abstract int getPrefixLength()
      Returns the number of characters that this completion has in common with the already present text.
      abstract int getScope()
      Returns a scope index for the alternative.
      abstract boolean isChained()
      Returns true if this completion should chain to another completion.
      abstract String toString()
      Returns the string description to use to describe this alternative to the user.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CodeAlternative

        public CodeAlternative()

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public abstract void apply()
        Applies this code alternative in the editor for which it was created. This alternative will be used to complete code at the insertion point.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(CodeAlternative other)
        Sorts code alternatives by scope, then context (if any), then string representation.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface Comparable<CodeAlternative>
        Parameters:
        other - the alternative to compare this alternative to
        Returns:
        an integer that indicates whether this alternative should be listed before (negative) at the same point (zero) or after (positive) the other alternative

      • getCategory

        public abstract String getCategory()
        Returns an optional description of the context for the alternative.
        Returns:
        a category description, or null

      • getIcon

        public abstract Icon getIcon()
        Optionally returns an icon to display for the alternative.
        Returns:
        an icon, or null

      • getPrefixLength

        public abstract int getPrefixLength()
        Returns the number of characters that this completion has in common with the already present text. For example, if the editor contains the text "he" and the code completion is "hello", then this should return 2.
        Returns:
        the length of the prefix that this alternative completes

      • getScope

        public abstract int getScope()
        Returns a scope index for the alternative. The scope value is used to sort alternatives into groups; the higher the scope, the closer the entry will be to the top of the list of alternatives presented to the user.
        Returns:
        a scope value for the alternative

      • isChained

        public abstract boolean isChained()
        Returns true if this completion should chain to another completion. If this returns true, and this completion is applied, then the user should immediately be prompted with another completion opportunity.
        Returns:
        true if this completion should lead to another

      • toString

        public abstract String toString()
        Returns the string description to use to describe this alternative to the user.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        the string description to return for the alternative
